ethics_bias_page.title: Ethics and Bias Considerations
ethics_bias_page.body: This section outlines the ethical considerations and bias mitigation strategies implemented in the Cancer Pod app to ensure fair and responsible use of user data.
model_limits: Does not provide a medical diagnosis or treatment plan.
Intended for informational purposes only; not a substitute for professional medical advice.
Does not predict individual cancer outcomes or risk with certainty.
what_it_will_not_do: Will not share personal data with third parties without consent.
Will not use data for purposes other than those explicitly stated.
Will not make decisions on behalf of users regarding their health.
ethics_bias_page.opt_in_language: By opting in, you agree to allow Cancer Pod to use your data to generate risk summaries and recommendations while adhering to strict ethical guidelines and data protection measures.
